name: Treasure Hunter (itch) (NoldGames)
description:
Collect treasure on land and at sea! Explore the environments and try to collect as much treasure as possible!

Made during 1 week for the Weekly Game Jam 169. Theme was Treasure Hunt

Character Controls:

  • Movement: W,A,S,D
  • Jump: Space
  • Climb: Space or Jump Into
  • Sprint: Shift

Boat Controls:

  • Forward: W
  • Turn: A and D

Additional Controls:

  • Press E when prompted to board and un-board the boat.
